CustomField.description: In FIRST or LAST operations, specify the string for the API Name of the field to order calc items by. Text is used instead of a Field Definition so that you can specify ordering by a parent's field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: In FIRST or LAST operations, specify the string for the API Name of the field to order calc items by. Text is used instead of a Field Definition so that you can specify ordering by a parent's field.
CustomField.label: Order By (First/Last)
